message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. This gives us both a good chunk of the money.
Your turn Alice. I'm feeling generous, but let's make it snappy. Time is money!
Bob, let's be realistic.  This is a better offer than the last round for both of us, considering the time crunch.
Okay Alice, let's meet in the middle. This is a fair deal considering the time pressure we both are under.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  A 50/50 split is the only fair option at this point. Let's end this.
